original_title: A Fresh Guide to Florence with Fab 5 Freddy
overview: In this revelatory documentary, hip-hop legend and art lover Fab 5 Freddy (aka Fred Brathwaite) saddles up to explore 15th-century Italian renaissance art in 15th-century style â€“ on horseback.  Amidst superstar artists such as Michelangelo, Giotto, Ghiberti and Carpaccio, Fab discovers groundbreaking images of a multi-racial and multi-ethnic society that have slipped through the cracks of art history.
title: A Fresh Guide to Florence with Fab 5 Freddy
